title: Add valueAt Stream Evaluator
description:
The valueAt Stream Evaluator returns the value at a specific index of an array or the value of a specific row and column of a matrix.

Sample syntax for an array:

let(a=array(1, 2, 3),
    b=valueAt(a, 2))
